alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gallatin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHWESTERN DEARBORN, NORTHERN SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL AND WEST CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Dillsboro, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Warsaw, Florence, Fairview, Ethridge, Center Square, Aberdeen, Pate, Markland, Farmers Retreat, Bear Branch, East Enterprise, Allensville, Quercus Grove, Mount Sterling, North Landing, Jacksonville, US Route 42 at State Route 184, and Rabbit Hash. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
